name: DOOM: The Savage Sewers (legalized)
description: After what seemed to be a life long struggle you have finally won. Hell's minions have been stopped. The invasion is no longer. You lay back to rest and dream of the medals and great rewards you will receive for having saved humanity. Then all of a sudden... "SSSS AAAGGGHHH!!!" A sound all too familiar echos from a drainage pipe leading to the sewers.
